snippet.title: Abalon Game Trailer
snippet.description: Abalon (formerly Summoners Fate) is a roguelike adventure that fuses tactical turn-based combat and card strategy. Choose your summoner and explore a tabletop world to discover its secrets. Build the perfect deck, outsmart your enemies and become legend! Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1681840/Abalon Launching to 1.0 on May 11th, 2023
